name: fetchEvents(taskID:query:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches all occurrences of a specific task asynchronously from the store. Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func fetchEvents(taskID: String, query: OCKEventQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKEvent<Self.Task, Self.Outcome>]>)
items.desc: Available when Outcome is OCKOutcome, OutcomeQuery is OCKOutcomeQuery, and Task conforms to OCKAnyVersionableTask.

declaration: func fetchEvents(taskID: String, query: OCKEventQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: @escaping OCKResultClosure<[Self.Event]>)
